1. Mayor & Council

Mayor & Council
===============

City Council
------------

* 4th Monday of the month
* Kaufman City Hall located at 209 South Washington in Kaufman

* Kaufman City Hall located at 209 South Washington in Kaufman

The City Council is made up of the following members:


![Council Group New](http://www.kaufmantx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3039 "Council Group New")

| Member | Term Ending | Contact |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Jeff Jordan, Mayor | May 2027 | [mayorjordan@kaufmantx.org](mailto:mayorjordan@kaufmantx.org) |
| Matthew Phillips, Mayor Pro-Tem | May 2027 | [councilmemberphillips@kaufmantx.org](mailto:councilmemberphillips@kaufmantx.org) |
| Jason Nelson | May 2027 | [councilmembernelson@kaufmantx.org](mailto:councilmemberpatterson@kaufmantx.org) |
| Ashlea Longenecker | May 2027 | [councilmemberlongenecker@kaufmantx.org](mailto:councilmemberlongenecker@kaufmantx.org) |
| Charles Gillenwater | May 2026 | [councilmembergillenwater@kaufmantx.org](mailto:councilmembercouncil@kaufmantx.org) |
| Lisa Parker | May 2026 | [councilmemberparker@kaufmantx.org](mailto:councilmembergillenwater@kaufmantx.org) |
| Quattro Borders | May 2026 | [councilmemberborders@kaufmantx.org](mailto:councilmemberratcliffe@kaufmantx.org) |

The Council is made up of a Mayor and Council elected for two year terms. The Mayor Pro Tem is appointed annually by the Council from the Council. Council member's terms are staggered. Four are elected in odd years and three are elected in even years.

City Charter
------------

The City of Kaufman became a
Home Rule Charter (PDF)
city in November of 1987.

City Ordinances
---------------


![DSC_1934](http://www.kaufmantx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3080 "DSC_1934")

The City Council holds their regular monthly meetings on the fourth (4th) Monday of each month unless a City observed holiday falls on that particular Monday. If this occurs, the meeting is scheduled for another day during that month. The rescheduled meeting date as well as any other special sessions will be posted on the City's website on this page and the "Calendar of Events" page as soon as it is determined.

As required by State law, an agenda for each meeting is conveniently posted for the public to view at least three (3) business days prior to the meeting. The City's official posting site for the City Council agendas is on the front glass of City Hall located at 209 South Washington Street. Current agendas and past agendas can be located on the "
Minutes and Agendas
" page.

For those citizens that have special needs to attend the meeting please call the City Secretary in advance at 972-932-2216. We will try to accommodate your needs.

The City Council is always seeking Kaufman residents that are willing to serve on the various
Boards and Commissions
. Go to the Boards and Commissions page to see what the responsibilities of our boards are and fill out an application.
